column5: I floated down the river yesterday using berkley gulp 3" minnow on a jig and man did i have success.  I landed close to 30 smallmouth (mind you there were a few small ones) in about 4 hours of fishing/canoeing.  This was my first time using them, and i out fished my partner by 15 fish.  Hoops
Thats not bad at all for grand. For me usually its a struggle, but way to go
I've had Gulp in my tacklebox for a while, I haven't used them yet  lol
That stuff really works....I use them for eyes and tip my jig with live leech to add more flavor  Great report hoops12 Thanks for sharing Leechman
